original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color>$Skill_CD(3591)@  武將身旁落下天雷，對周圍敵人造成$Skill_Str(3591)@武力傷害與$Skill_Int(3591)@智力傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color>$Skill_CD(3591)@ The sky thunder fell beside the military commander, causing $Skill_Str(3591)@武力 damage and $Skill_Int(3591)@智力 damage to the surrounding enemies.
